data.title: Production Program
data.meta_description: For full-length documentaries, please refer to the Theatrical Documentary Program webpage. Summary Project type Feature-length film Project stage Production and post-production Applicants Canadian audiovisual production companies Submission Dialogue Program overview The Production Program finances Canadian feature films at the production or post-production stage. For documentary projects, please see the Theatrical Documentary Program webpage for more information. Who […]
data.text:
All projects with budgets of $3.5 million or more including international coproductions.

Opening

8:00 AM EST Closing

11:59 PM EST All projects in English-language with budgets of $3.5 million or more, including international coproductions.

Opening

8:00 AM EDT Closing

11:59 PM EDT All French-language projects at all budget levels with a confirmed funding structure of 60% or more, including international coproductions.

*Subject to the availability of funds. Opening

8:00 AM EDT Closing

11:59 PM EDT All projects in English-language with budgets of $3.5 million or more, including international coproductions.

*Subject to the availability of funds. Opening
